AND t_help_doc.help_doc_catalog_id = #{query.helpDocCatalogId}
AND ( INSTR(t_help_doc.title,#{query.keywords}) OR INSTR(t_help_doc.author,#{query.keywords}) )
AND DATE_FORMAT(t_help_doc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t_help_doc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY t_help_doc.sort ASC, t_help_doc.create_time DESC
